titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: = "Loving Spiral"? s2: = "to"? "sent p.c. Nov 8 for" has arrow pointing to "Old Wives Tale"

body.ab:
1939 Dr CHALOT _ Mlle Monique 45 , rue Mathurin Regnier Paris. XVe2 1 year. 1v. A 200 1 m. 1v. A. 25 no dep. July 27 Stranger Prince Oct. 25 garden Party Oct. 25 Note in Music ren. oct. 25 Nov. 6 Invitation to the Waltz Oct. 25 Music at Night Oct. 25 Story of the Women also Dream Oct. 25 Something of Myself Oct. 25 Passionate Elopement Oct. 25 Black Arrow Oct. 25 Irish Fairy Tales Oct. 25 Weather in the Streets Oct. 25 The good Earth _ Oct. 25 Nov. 6 Fountain Nov. 22 Nov. 22 Jalna pd 10v fine Feb 29 1940 Feb 29 Whiteoaks March 6 March 6 Finch's Fortune March 12 March 12 Master of Jalna April 1 April 1 Whiteoak Harvest May 27 May 27 Breakfast in Bed June 3 June 3 Diary of a Provincial Lady Sept 23 Renewed August 1 - November 1st 1941 2 vols S70 Aug 1st New Machiavelli Sept 18 1st Loving Sept 18 1st grand Canary Sept 18 1st modern Hero Sept 18
CHALOT to Nov 1 1941 Sept 18 Here day Oct 10 18 Nobody's in Town Oct 10 Oct 10 Old Wives Tale Nov 10 10 Modern Tragedy Nov 10 sent p.c. Nov 8 for Nov 10 Charwomans Daughter Nov 15
